title: BitRuby
author: BitRuby
created_time: September 21, 2023, 11:04:51 AMLast edit: September 21, 2023, 12:28:17 PM by BitRuby
content: Hello Bitcointalk Community,We're excited to introduce BitRuby, a groundbreaking cryptocurrency casino set to redefine the online gaming experience. As we stand at the very beginning of our journey, we acknowledge there might be occasional hiccups or bugs. Your feedback is invaluable in helping us refine and perfect our platform.OUR COMMITMENT IS TO PROVIDE:â€¢ Transparency: Detailed game mechanics and fair odds.â€¢ Security: Top-notch measures to protect your assets and data.â€¢ Innovation: A curated selection of games tailored for the crypto enthusiast.FEATURES:â€¢ Unbeatable Bonuses: Fund your account from 10 USDT and receive a whopping 200% on your deposit!â€¢ Exciting achievements tailored for our loyal playersâ€¢ Instant deposits in USDT, USDC, BUSD, and BTCâ€¢ Live betting options for an immersive gaming experienceREACH US AT:â€¢ BitRuby.ioâ€¢ Telegram Channelâ€¢ Telegram Chatâ€¢ InstagramOpen dialogue is at the heart of our ethos. We welcome conversations, constructive criticism, and any insights that can help us serve you better.We invite you to be a part of our journey. Stay tuned for updates, partnerships, and special promotions. Feedback and questions are always welcome!

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: Welcome to the forum, and it's good to have you here. You can take a small tour of the forum and other casino Ann threads to see how things appear from their end. You will need to activate the  copper member on your account  in order to enable you to add images to your Ann thread.I just took a quick preview of your casino, and I must say the design is catching my eye. Without going forward, I want to ask a question regarding the accepted currency, as you mentioned only a few altcoins and its chains there. Is BTC also enabled for withdrawal and deposit, as the listed currency you mentioned on your front page might just be for the allowed ones that can do a direct wallet connection to the casino? Itâ€™s mentioned in your thread here but not on the casino front page.

comments.author: BitRuby
comments.body: Yes, currently BTC and BUSD do not supported for withdraws, but we are providing swap utility of BTC and BUSD to (USDT, USDC) which are supported for withdraw

The Op or you?You definitely should go with the advise above and get a copper membership to allow you post images because I can see that you dropped a direct link to an image thatâ€™s supposed to have displayed here in the forum, and trust me youâ€™ll only get 5% of those that will visit your thread to click on that link thatâ€™s because no one wants to click on a link posted by a newbie since it could be malicious so do well to get your account upgrade to copper rank. comments.author: bangjoe
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcoin Talk Community.Gambling site by prioritizing decentralization and your project expanding using web3 to achieve it, it's good and we still rarely find web3 casinos here, but indeed your project is still very new, like a newborn baby.Your site is quite interesting, and quite responsive.But unfortunately there are still a few games that can be played here, only exist;CrashLotteryLimboHash DicePlinkoOnly Plinko I usually play, the others for me are not interesting, I honestly prefer slot games and sports betting, because it is much more fun.If your project wants to get more attention, in my opinion you open ann with casino images, and you can market your project through the signature campaign manager so that the user range can be wider about your project.

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: BitRuby on September 21, 2023, 11:46:02 AMYes, currently BTC and BUSD do not supported for withdraws, but we are providing swap utility of BTC and BUSD to (USDT, USDC) which are supported for withdrawThis is good feature on a casino. What exchange rate you are using and does your swap feature has a exchange fee because this will surely be disadvantageous your user. Why not automatically convert all the deposits to USD then allow then to withdraw on any currency that you support without the need to swap or something. Duelbits has this kind of feature that automatically convert deposits to USD coins then user can withdraw on their desired currency directly on the withdrawal tab.

comments.author: bitrubick
comments.body: Yeah, thats a nice feature, there is also option to create some kind of unique crypto coin and to convert all deposits to it, but we decided to give broader choice for user, and to improve our UI based on reviews of community, we are in the beggining  there gonna be features like to convert all to USDT, we doing our bestFees are basic, smth like 0.05 USDT, we gonna see how it will go, may be we gonna lower it or make it higher, we will see, and exchange prices are from crypto oracles, which are widely used

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Of the several new casinos that have appeared on the forum in the past few days, it seems like you are the only one who has registered as a copper member, so you look more serious about promoting the casino site than the others who don't look that serious, the image display and wording look quite good, I also saw that The games on this site happen to be games that I often play at several casinos including Limbo and Crash.But I saw the RBC coin there on live betting and it seems that it is a token or coin belonging to your site, are the tokens and coins just for demo or have their own value on your site or do they already exist on the crypto market and are already being bought and sold on exchanges, happy if you explain a little because in this thread it is not written about RBC and there is only USDT USDC BUSD and BTC, but it's nice to see that there is a Polygon network there making it easier for me maybe to test a little of my money for games on your site to try my luck, Btw welcome to bitcointalk

comments.author: Apocollapse
comments.body: Welcome to the forum.Your casino is still new, but when I check in the lucky wins, I'm surprised there was someone managed to hit 10,000x multiplier and earn $419,958. To be honest I don't trust this because I know small casino will not have such big bankroll and they will choose to run away than pay such huge money.Code:Game Player Bust Bet Profit Plinko 8bV2V 10000x 42 USDT 419958.00 USDT

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Hello and Welcome to the forum.It is always nice to see a new Casino coming here and introducing itself. I did visit your casino and my first impression was that it looks good. The user interface is simple to understand, maybe because you do not have a big list of games now. I hope to see more games in the future and I do hope you are ready with some marketing plans for your casino here. I did not see any exclusive offer for the Bitcointalk community, except the 200% deposit bonus that you are offering. It would be an excellent idea for you to come up with some exclusive offers for us and I hope to see some soon. Best of Luck Bitruby team.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: BitRuby on September 21, 2023, 11:04:51 AMâ€¢ Unbeatable Bonuses: Fund your account from 10 USDT and receive a whopping 200% on your deposit!What's the wagering for this bonus? It is optional, right?Well, it's quite hard to maintain this 200% bonus because there will be a lot of abuses. People will create multiple accounts to claim the bonus many times. That's a real experience I have gained by observing betcrypto.cr bonus.

comments.author: bitrubick
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on September 21, 2023, 01:37:55 PMQuote from: BitRuby on September 21, 2023, 11:04:51 AMâ€¢ Unbeatable Bonuses: Fund your account from 10 USDT and receive a whopping 200% on your deposit!What's the wagering for this bonus? It is optional, right?Well, it's quite hard to maintain this 200% bonus because there will be a lot of abuses. People will create multiple accounts to claim the bonus many times. That's a real experience I have gained by observing betcrypto.cr bonus.Currently we use such formula, wager * 0.001 * 2 for real coins, and (wager * 0.001 * 2) / 200 for RBC coinSo, if you deposited 10$, basically you need 5k wager for it, thats it
